definition: reduced in efficacy or vitality or intensity
details:
adjective
- reduced in efficacy or vitality or intensity
= example: reduced in efficacy or vitality or intensity
= synonyms: shrivelled, shrunken
- lean and wrinkled by shrinkage as from age or illness
= example: lean and wrinkled by shrinkage as from age or illness
= synonyms: shrivelled, shrunken, withered, wizen, wizened
- (used especially of vegetation) having lost all moisture
= synonyms: shrivelled, withered, dried-up, sere, sear
